text: Ficus pulchella is a species of tree in the family Moraceae. It is native to South America. ==Conservation== It is considered a vulnerable species by the IUCN, as it is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== pulchella Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Trees of Brazil Category:Flora of Pará Category:Flora of Paraná (state) Category:Flora of Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Flora of Santa Catarina (state) Category:Environment of Maranhão Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Trees of Peru Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ficus pulchella
